com.dialonce.sdk

Class DialOnce

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dialonce.sdk.DialOnce

  • public final class DialOnce
extends Object
    Entry point to setup Dial-Once SDK

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String FORCE_SYNC_ACTION 
      static List<String> PERMISSIONS

      DialOnce SDK permission request id which used in requestPermissions(Activity)

        Parameters:
        permissions - which was requested
        grantResults - which contains result per permission (the same order as in permissions)
